snippet: Vicky Pryce, a top government economist, was found guilty Thursday of perverting justice, capping the collapse of the ambitions she and a leading Liberal Democrat,  Chris Huhne, shared.
abstract: Vicky Pryce, top economist who agreed in 2003 to falsely name herself as driver in speeding offense committed by her ex-husband, British politician Chris Huhne, is found guilty of perverting course of justice, capping collapse of her political ambitions.
lead_paragraph: Vicky Pryce, a top government economist, was found guilty Thursday of perverting justice, capping the collapse of the ambitions she and a leading Liberal Democrat,  Chris Huhne, shared.

headline.seo: British Power Couple’s Long, Seamy Slide
headline.main: A British Power Couple’s Long, Seamy Slide
headline.print_headline:
Britain: Politician’s Ex-Wife Convicted
Of Lying in Old Speeding Ticket Case
